title: Tomato and pesto puff pastry tart
ingredients: ['300g cherry tomatoes, halved', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed', '3 tablespoons basil pesto', '225g fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced']
